name: Lünersee – Schesaplana Loop from Schuders
description: A challenging hike requiring excellent fitness, sure-footedness, sturdy footwear, and alpine experience. The starting point is accessible by public transportation.

notes: Some sections of this route pass through very technical, difficult, or dangerous terrain. Specialized equipment and experience are required.

route.name: Lünersee
route.description: A beautiful lake, rightfully named the most beautiful place in Austria in 2019 on the show '9 Places - 9 Treasures'. The newly renovated cable car quickly takes you up, but there is also a mountain path from the valley station. A scenic hiking path goes around the lake. Fishing is also possible with a permit.

route.name: Steep Ascent
route.description: It’s worth climbing Schesaplana. The view is magnificent.

route.name: Schesaplana
route.description: The strenuous climb is rewarded with a panoramic 360-degree view. The highest peak of the Rätikon range towers over its neighboring peaks. The summit cross bears the inscription 'You are the lord of the mountains and the king of the peaks.' The next higher mountain is over 30 kilometers away in the Silvretta group.

route.name: Austrian/Swiss Border
route.description: From the border, you have a lovely view of Lünersee. Be careful with roaming charges on your mobile phone, as you’re entering Switzerland!

route.name: Beautiful View of Lünersee & Totalp
route.description: Lünersee is a highlight from every viewpoint.

route.name: Totalphütte
route.description: After the total destruction of the Totalphütte by an avalanche in 2019, it has now been rebuilt and invites you to enjoy food and drinks. The service is friendly, and the nature is simply indescribable. Lünersee is truly the most beautiful place.

route.name: Lünerseeblick
route.tip_by: Geofussl, finally back with my dog.

route.name: Böser Tritt Drinking Station
route.description: Fill up your drinks here if you skip the Douglashütte.
